column4: I added modes "1280x1024" to my xorg.conf, but I still can only select 640x480 in displays. How can I force higher resolution? (there's no resolutions listed under "Monitor" should there be?)
It worked fine on another 1920x1200 monitor, but this one is connected with a 15pin d-sub
so I guess there's no data communication
Should xorg.conf have resolutions under the "monitor" section?
it's hard in 640x480 :) - what should I search for?
(WW) NVIDIA(GPU-0): Unable to read EDID for display device CRT-1
Hmmmm, It's not a monitor per-se - it's a panel that's used as a display in an airport terminal. So it don't have any real specifications :
tried removing xorg.conf? AFAIK it's not needed these days
